an5.60:1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato dullabho vuḍḍhapabbajito. Katamehi pañcahi? Dullabho, bhikkhave, vuḍḍhapabbajito suvaco, dullabho suggahitaggāhī, dullabho padakkhiṇaggāhī, dullabho dhammakathiko, dullabho vinayadharo. Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato dullabho vuḍḍhapabbajito"ti.
an5.60:2: Āvaraṇaṁ rāsi aṅgāni,samayaṁ mātuputtikā;Upajjhā ṭhānā licchavi,kumārā aparā duveti.
